Headline: #53 Pulaski Temporary Reroute at Pulaski/Monroe
ShortDescription: 53 Pulaski buses are temporarily rerouted via: Pulaski, Madison, Hamlin, Jackson, Pulaski, due to, street blockage, near Pulaski/Monroe.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#53 Pulaski  buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via: Pulaski, Madison, Hamlin, Jackson, and Pulaski, due to, street blockage, near Pulaski/Monroe.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Howard-bound Red Line Service Delayed at Jackson
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line trains are standing at Jackson due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are standing at Jackson due to police activity. 

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
